channel.title: Shift-left on My learning and diary
channel.description: Recent content in Shift-left on My learning and diary

item.title: Shift-lefts in kubernetes with datree
item.description: Shift-left is a things nowadays. Recently I read an articles about that beyond testing and security. Today I gave it a try using datree and found that there are still a lot of places to improve in one of my clusters. It is not just a small number. There maybe are many new concepts, configurations and best practicies behind the numbers. kubectl datree test > test.log rg -n ‚ùå test.
